title: Civil groups
context: ยง122A-13 Civil groups. No civil organization, society, club, post, order, fraternity, association, brotherhood, body, union, league, or other combination of persons or civil group shall be enlisted in the Hawaii state defense force as an organization or unit. [L 1987, c 35, pt of ยง1; am L 1988, c 135, ยง1]
